mapper.insert: insert into t_member(mem_id,mem_pw,mem_name,mem_birthdate,mem_phone, mem_email, mem_addr, mem_joindate, admin_yn) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{mem_pw}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_birthdate}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_email},#{mem_addr}, 'sysdate', 'N')
mapper.select: select mem_Id,mem_Pw from t_member where mem_Id=#{mem_id} and mem_Pw =#{mem_pw}
